ProductInfo.Features:
Real time remote surveillance by PC Monitor. 30 fps recording and display
4 channel security cameras PCI DVR. Cards are stackable, expendable to 16 channel
Advanced event search features: search recorded files by year, month, date, hour
Camera features: Built-in microphone and IR-Cut filter, 36 IR illuminators for night vision, 520 TVL high resolution
Package including: 4 of IR bullet security cameras; 1 of DVR card with 4 channel input; 1 of 4 channel power supply and bonus security warning decals
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Channel PCI Video Capture Card DVR Digital Video Record CCTV Home Surveillance System including 4 of IR Day Night Vision Audio Bullet Security Cameras with Power Supply WP3
